      • gainExperience

        public void gainExperience(long experience)
        Description copied from interface: HasExperience
        Adds experience to the current experience. When the experience cap for new level is reached, any remaining experience is rolled over to the new level experience cap and level is increased. The experience stop to gain when level is 25.
        Specified by:
        gainExperience in interface HasExperience
        Parameters:
        experience - the amount of experience to add.
